title: Smurfing
body:
Is it allowed? and if so why?


Ever since I starting playing pvp from level 5 , there are obvious players the that are smuring  (such as characters off the free rotation playing with legendary skins at low levels).
Seriously I think it ruins the experience to lose game after game and have your nose rubbed in it as well eg "get rekt" " noob" blah blah

I understand there is a learning curve with any game but it really does make for an overall unfair and unfun experience.

replies.body:
There is nothing against Smurfing itself in the Terms of Use. That said, Smurfing is not necessarily condoned by Riot Games and various individuals in the League of Legends community as Smurfing generally entails an experienced player creating an alternate account that is seemingly unexperienced which can be seen as an unfair advantage on those players who are legitimately new to the game. That said, upon creating an account Riot provides the option of selecting your experience level from First Timer to Veteran. From this it is ideal that you pick the option that is most truthful to your situation and upon being truthful will match you up with other Smurfs. Supposedly. 

Interestingly enough. I {{champion:86}} tee that you will find that about 1/4 of all League of Legends accounts are Smurfs. 

Regards,
Fog

Thank you for the response.  
A quarter of all accounts !

maybe i should go back to scrabble since it  doesn't appear likely this situation will change any time soon. :(

Basically what Fog said. In no way is it against any rules set by Riot, and there is generally nothing wrong with it, but then you get some bad apples ruining the bunch. There are a lot of smurfs out there who don't act all high and mighty that respect their fellow players and they are generally the ones who don't mention they're using a smurf. But then you get the, and forgive my language, assholes who brag about being a smurf and treat others like sh!t because it's low level/ELO. And to top it all off there are a significant number of players who claim to be high ELO smurfs who are really just new players, thus furthering the stereotype that smurfs are a bad thing. I feel you in regards to the assholes out there, we all get our unfair share of it, but there's not much that can be done outside reporting.

I killed a lvl 5 nasus player with 3 CS 10 mins while playing yorick

Enjoy.
